title: The Category of Operator Spaces and Complete Contractions
abstract:
We show that the category OS of operator spaces, with complete contractions
as morphisms, is locally countably presentable. This result, together with its
symmetric monoidal closed structure with respect to the projective tensor
product of operator spaces, implies the existence of cofree (cocommutative)
coalgebras with respect to the projective tensor product and therefore provides
a mathematical model of Intuitionistic Linear Logic in the sense of Lafont.
